statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Bucknell edges past Marist in season opener 75-72
article.headline: Bucknell edges past Marist in season opener 75-72
article.linkText: Bucknell edges past Marist in season opener 75-72
article.story: LEWISBURG, Pa. -- Dom Hoffman scored 14 points and D.J. MacLeay added 11 as Bucknell pulled ahead after a back-and-forth battle to beat Marist 75-72 on Friday night. The Bison led by as many as seven points early after the break, but a 13-2 run gave Marist a four-point lead midway through the second half. MacLeay went on to score six-straight points to put Bucknell ahead once more; sparking a 10-0 run that gave the Bison the advantage they needed with 3:05 left to play. Three other Bison players scored in double digits -- John Azzinaro finished with 13, J.C. Show had 12, and Steven Kaspar added 10. Khallid Hart scored a career-high 33 points, accounting for all of Marist's final 14 points to pull the Red Foxes within two, 74-72, with just 15 seconds left. Chavaughn Lewis added 18 as Mike Maker made his debut as head coach for Marist.
